subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The stakes are high and the challenge is immense for Rutgers Saturday night when they play West Virginia. A victory will mean a conference championship and a likely trip to the Orange Bowl.
snippet: The stakes are high and the challenge is immense for Rutgers Saturday night when they play West Virginia. A victory will mean a conference championship and a likely trip to the Orange Bowl.
